instructions.uploadLimit: Upload up to 5 photos to customize your background
instructions.usingCustom: Using your custom photo. Click it again to switch back to default.
instructions.usingDefault: Using beautiful default backgrounds that rotate automatically.
instructions.clickToUse: • Click a photo to use it as your background
instructions.clickToRevert: • Click again to switch back to default
instructions.hoverToDelete: • Hover and click trash icon to delete a photo
